title: Consumer Price Index, August 2015 (National Statistical Bureau of Bhutan)
text: ( Source : National Statistical Bureau of Bhutan ) The National Statistics Bureau ( NSB ) has released the Monthly Consumer Price Index and Inflation report for the year ending in August on September 29th . The month-to-month inflation for August
